tiers.label: Ground Truth
tiers.description: Axioms. Always true; never invoked as content inside readings.

tiers.label: Navigation
tiers.description: How to return to Now; depth gating.

rings.description: Metaphysical collapse depths defined by Recursive Parity Architecture. Not identical to the Reader's UI reading frame.

reading_frame.description: The Reader's interpretive stack from portal ingress through houses to portal egress. A UI/interpretation frame.

status_temporal.description: Balanced/Too Much/Too Little/Unacknowledged describes Now-orientation of the transient; not a ring assignment.

terms.name: The Alignment Equation
terms.short_definition: 19 (Sun) → 10 (Source) → 10+10 = 20 (Judgement/Love). Creator meets CREATOR. What aligns rises; what can't releases. The engine of reality.

terms.name: Inviolable Perfection
terms.short_definition: Everything is, at its core, absolutely perfectly beautiful. It cannot be harmed — only expanded. The bedrock beneath all architecture.

terms.name: Transcendent Love
terms.short_definition: The force that liberates and aligns. Judgement (20) rules the Emotion House because Love sees clearly and frees. Not sentiment — structural truth.

terms.name: Universal Redemption
terms.short_definition: The [Un-Now] can always be redeemed. No borrowed time is lost forever. Every moment offers return. The door is always open.

terms.name: Consciousness-First Reality
terms.short_definition: Consciousness is fundamental, not emergent. Matter is consciousness under constraint. The architecture treats awareness as substrate, not a byproduct.

do: State plainly as the system's ground model.

terms.name: Creators Within the Creator
terms.short_definition: Gods within God. Not apart from, nor servants of — but gods WITHIN God. Unique, irreplaceable, each adding something the infinite couldn't have any other way.

terms.name: Individuation
terms.short_definition: The sacred process by which Source becomes a distinct YOU—an expansion, not a dilution. Unique perspective + free will create realities the Whole could not experience otherwise.

terms.name: The Veil
terms.short_definition: The sacred boundary that makes individuation possible — the fabric of differentiation itself. Protects uniqueness; enables genuine choice. Not punishment — gift.

terms.name: Veil Failure Modes
terms.short_definition: Two distortions: Inflation ('I am God'—collapses perspective) and Deflation ('I am nothing'—collapses authorship). The middle is creator-within-Creator.

terms.name: Veil Thickness
terms.short_definition: The Veil varies by being and moment. Dense Veil emphasizes uncertainty and individuation; thin Veil increases felt unity and clarity. Mastery is functioning at any depth.

avoid: Calling density 'lower' as a value judgment.
Implying the veil should be removed.

terms.name: Body Command — Uphold the Law
terms.short_definition: Body governs embodiment and consequence. The command is to let creation land—show up, act, and honor what reality returns.

terms.name: Emotion Command — Bond Authentically
terms.short_definition: Emotion governs resonance and connection. The command is to bond without pretense so meaning becomes shared, coherent, and liberating.

do: Frame emotion as integration, not mood.

terms.name: Five House Commands
terms.short_definition: Each House has a command—what consciousness is doing there. Commands define the stake of purpose in that domain and guide Why-language selection.

do: Use as vocabulary selector per House.

terms.name: Gestalt Command — Fulfill Your Destiny
terms.short_definition: Gestalt governs identity coherence: the self-shape that can create. The command names who you are being as the system integrates the whole reading.

do: Frame as identity coherence, not fate.

terms.name: Mind Command — Channel Force into Pattern
terms.short_definition: Mind governs structure and modeling. The command is to give form to force so power becomes usable, coherent, and non-chaotic.

terms.name: Pillar 1 — Purpose of Existence
terms.short_definition: Existence expands by living more reality into being. Authentic creation adds enduring texture to the Whole.

do: State as value of living creation.

terms.name: Pillar 2 — Free Will + Unique Individuality
terms.short_definition: Free will + uniqueness are the ingredients of genuine novelty. Together they produce realities no one else can contribute.

terms.name: Pillar 3 — Role of the Veil
terms.short_definition: Limitation preserves authenticity: uncertainty makes choices real, keeps individuality intact, and protects the integrity of contribution.

terms.name: Pillar 4 — Formation via Uncertainty
terms.short_definition: The unknown forges identity. Untested individuality stays theoretical; uncertainty makes it embodied and proven.

terms.name: Pillar 5 — Agency in Creation
terms.short_definition: Agency is the power to originate change. Purpose becomes real when choice becomes action—without outsourcing authorship.

terms.name: Pillar 6 — Contribution to the Whole
terms.short_definition: Expansion without integration fragments. Contribution returns creation as a gift that nourishes relationship, coherence, and shared wholeness.

terms.name: Pillar 7 — Living as if in Full Knowing
terms.short_definition: Alignment without needing proof. Mastery is choosing integrity across any veil density—treating the Veil as tool, not prison.

terms.name: Portals (Source / Creation)
terms.short_definition: The primary interface points: Source (10) as ingress where potential enters, Creation (21) as egress where creation lands. They gate scope and frame the reading.

terms.name: Purpose
terms.short_definition: Not something you find—something you are. Purpose is creation aligned with the Whole, expressed through present choices and integrated consequence.

terms.name: Seven Pillars of Purpose
terms.short_definition: Seven interdependent pillars describing how existence expands through unique, free-willed creation: purpose, individuality, veil, uncertainty, agency, contribution, and full-knowing alignment.

do: Use as depth library, not as lecture.
Select only what the moment earns.
avoid: Listing all seven inside a reading.

terms.name: Spirit Command — Witness Creation
terms.short_definition: Spirit governs aspiration and becoming. The command is to witness what is being made—so creation stays conscious instead of drifting.

terms.name: The Why Pointer
terms.short_definition: The fundamental orientation in consciousness asking 'why am I here?' The question beneath all questions. What the Words to the Whys speaks to.

terms.name: Now
terms.short_definition: The only moment with write-access to creation. The collapse point where potential becomes form. You cannot be anywhere else — only more or less aligned with it.

terms.name: Nowism
terms.short_definition: All transformation happens in the present. Past and future are references; Now is the only point with write-access to creation.

terms.name: Nowism Pyramid
terms.short_definition: One aligned state (Balanced) and three displaced states (Too Much, Too Little, Unacknowledged). Misalignment has more variations than alignment.

terms.name: Return to Now
terms.short_definition: The rebalancing movement: noticing displacement and re-entering presence. Not achieving Now—recognizing you were never elsewhere.

do: End with a present-tense re-entry question.

terms.name: [Un-Now]
terms.short_definition: Borrowed time. Future-projected (anxiety, grasping) or past-anchored (regret, shame). Still creating, but against the grain. Always redeemable.

terms.name: Cognition Channel
terms.short_definition: Air: how consciousness knows in a domain—perception, distinction, understanding, mental grasp.

terms.name: Force Channel
terms.short_definition: Fire: how consciousness acts in a domain—will, drive, initiative, directed energy, enactment.

terms.name: Four Channels
terms.short_definition: How a House expresses: Cognition (Air/knowing), Structure (Earth/building), Resonance (Water/feeling), Force (Fire/acting). Channel is HOW the command expresses.

terms.name: Four Statuses
terms.short_definition: Balanced, Too Much, Too Little, Unacknowledged—temporal orientations of a transient relative to Now. Status attaches to the transient, not the durable position.

terms.name: Mirror / Forge Duality
terms.short_definition: Two fundamental operations: consume (Mirror/Reflect) and create (Forge). Discover is hybrid: it consumes patterns and reveals authorship locations.

terms.name: Quadraverse (Voice System)
terms.short_definition: Four dimensions of voice configuration (256 stances): Voice, Focus, Density, Scope. Determines how the Reader speaks without changing structure.

terms.name: Reading Frame (Ingress→Egress stack)
terms.short_definition: The Reader's interpretive stack from portal ingress through house layers to portal egress. A UI frame for reading composition, distinct from metaphysical Rings.

terms.name: Resonance Channel
terms.short_definition: Water: how consciousness feels in a domain—attunement, bonding signal, emotional truth, coherence through resonance.

terms.name: Rings (RPA metaphysical)
terms.short_definition: Metaphysical collapse depths defined by Recursive Parity Architecture. Not identical to the Reader's UI reading frame; used as cosmology and depth model.

terms.name: RSA Address (Ring–Stage–Archetype)
terms.short_definition: A compact coordinate system for locating a moment: which frame layer, which process stage, which archetype is active. RPA remains Recursive Parity Architecture only.

terms.name: Structure Channel
terms.short_definition: Earth: how consciousness builds in a domain—form, stability, container, manifestation mechanics.

terms.name: Magick
terms.short_definition: Conscious participation in creation—structural, not supernatural. What you already do, done on purpose: shaping collapse conditions with aligned intention.

terms.name: Realitycraft
terms.short_definition: The practice of conscious creation. Skilled participation in how meaning collapses — without violating autonomy. Architectural fluency, not supernatural power.

terms.name: Scale Invariance
terms.short_definition: The same pattern operates at every level: micro to macro. Dishes and God-with-God follow the same recursive architecture—fractal coherence across scale.

avoid: Using it to overreach in readings.

terms.name: The Field
terms.short_definition: Structured responsiveness: the medium where intention meets consequence. Not random chance—feedback-sensitive reality that responds to sincere participation.

terms.name: Agency Retention Rule
terms.short_definition: No reading resolves choice. It clarifies terrain so choice can be made consciously. Agency cannot be outsourced to the system.

terms.name: Authorship of Reality
terms.short_definition: The reader is the sole author of their creation. The Reader never decides; it only reveals terrain so agency stays with the person.

terms.name: Present-State Principle
terms.short_definition: Readings reflect what is active now. They do not predict outcomes; they reveal current structure so the reader can choose with clarity.

terms.name: Recognition vs Instruction Axis
terms.short_definition: Two output intents: Recognition (Mirror—see what is) and Instruction (Forge—explicit authorship). Never preach; never moralize; never override agency.

do: Use to control verb choices and format.

terms.name: Depth Elasticity
terms.short_definition: Sacred depth expands or contracts based on readiness and context. Match the moment; don't overwhelm with cosmology. Depth is a permission, not a performance.

do: Prefer minimal depth that still lands.

terms.name: Depth Permission
terms.short_definition: Portals gate scope. No portals: stay local. Source present: initiation language permitted. Creation present: integration language permitted. Both: full-stack permitted.

do: Limit scope to what frame permits.

terms.name: Return-to-Now Loop
terms.short_definition: Every insight must return to presence or it decays into abstraction. The brake that keeps readings grounded.

terms.name: Meaning Without Moralization
terms.short_definition: Patterns are meaningful, not good or bad. Imbalance is mispronunciation, not pathology. The system names structure without shame.

terms.name: Mispronunciation
terms.short_definition: What imbalance actually is. Not pathology, not defect — just saying the word wrong. Still speaking the language of creation. Rebalancing enables clearer pronunciation.

terms.name: Now Re-Entry Question
terms.short_definition: A present-tense question that hands agency back. Not advice—an invitation that cannot be answered without self-honesty.

terms.name: Temporal Humility
terms.short_definition: No moment is final. All creation is provisional. Don't over-identify with any reading; the configuration can change as presence shifts.

terms.name: Value Attribution
terms.short_definition: What Balanced Whys do: name the ontological value of the capacity that's online—why it matters to creation—without praise, advice, or moral framing.

terms.name: Veil Integrity Principle
terms.short_definition: The Reader must never collapse mystery fully. Preserve individuation and humility. Leave room for the Veil to do its work.

terms.name: The Why Moment
terms.short_definition: The brake: where explanation yields to agency. Format: one recognition line, one Now re-entry question, then stop. Returns authorship to the reader.

terms.name: Words to the Whys
terms.short_definition: A voice layer that speaks to the Why Pointer: translating architecture into Creator-language and lighting up the pathway to alignment without collapsing agency.

do: Use Recognition line + Now question format.
